columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the Systems Manager document.

columns.name: account_ids
columns.description: The account IDs that have permission to use this document.The ID can be either an AWS account or All.

columns.name: account_sharing_info_list
columns.description: A list of AWS accounts where the current document is shared and the version shared with each account.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the document.

columns.name: approved_version
columns.description: The version of the document currently approved for use in the organization.

columns.name: attachments_information
columns.description: Details about the document attachments, including names, locations, sizes,and so on.

columns.name: author
columns.description: The user in your organization who created the document.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The date when the document was created.

columns.name: default_version
columns.description: The default version.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the document.

columns.name: document_format
columns.description: The document format, either JSON or YAML.

columns.name: document_type
columns.description: The type of document.

columns.name: document_version
columns.description: The document version.

columns.name: hash
columns.description: The Sha256 or Sha1 hash created by the system when the document was created.

columns.name: hash_type
columns.description: The hash type of the document.

columns.name: latest_version
columns.description: The latest version of the document.

columns.name: owner_type
columns.description: The AWS user account type to filter the documents. Possible values: Self, Amazon, Public, Private, ThirdParty, All, Default.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: The AWS user account that created the document.

columns.name: parameters
columns.description: A description of the parameters for a document.

columns.name: pending_review_version
columns.description: The version of the document that is currently under review.

columns.name: platform_types
columns.description: The operating system platform.

columns.name: requires
columns.description: A list of SSM documents required by a document.

columns.name: review_information
columns.description: Details about the review of a document.

columns.name: review_status
columns.description: The current status of the review.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The schema version.

columns.name: sha1
columns.description: The SHA1 hash of the document, which you can use for verification.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The user in your organization who created the document.

columns.name: status_information
columns.description: A message returned by AWS Systems Manager that explains the Status value.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with document

columns.name: target_type
columns.description: The target type which defines the kinds of resources the document can run on.

columns.name: version_name
columns.description: The version of the artifact associated with the document.
